info.name: Neue Dark Tumblr
info.description:
An edit/update of "Neue - Dark Tumblr Dash Theme" by deej @ https://userstyles.org/styles/93452/neue-dark-tumblr-dash-theme .
Works well with xkit
info.additionalInfo:
v2.0.6

Feb 16, 2015: Fixed top right background issue on user blogs.

v2.0.5.1

Dec 16, 2014: No real changes, just added a screenshot since automatically adding it wasn't working so well.

v2.0.5

Dec 1, 2014: Fixed some glass that was still blue.

v2.0.4

Dec 1, 2014: Fixed ask bubbles/nipples.

v2.0.3

Dec 1, 2014: Fixed Chat lines.

v2.0.2

Nov 30, 2014: First Edit/Update, please tell me if it's broken somehow.
